00120 inline Region Region::operator+ (const Region& region) const
00121 {
00122     Region temp;
00123     
00124     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = this->coordinates_.begin(); i not_eq coordinates_.end(); ++i )

00126     
00127     for ( std::vector<PixelCoordinates>::const_iterator i = region.coordinates_.begin(); i not_eq region.coordinates_.end(); ++i )
00128         temp.addCoordinates( (*i) );

00130     return temp;
